segments.text: I'm really worried seeing that stool tip under the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so high up, hand in the cookie jar, one slip away from falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below looks up expectantly, not realizing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the sink overflowing, water everywhere— what if they slip on it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there but focused only on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, she could fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets getting soaked, dishes might break if chaos ensues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a safe garden, but inside it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids sneaking cookies— innocent, but so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the faucet was off; this could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed— it's bound to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, they don't know how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
